referralLink.shareText: Come and build your team and let's earn money together!

faqPage.title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
faqPage.q1: What is Ai Brok Trade Pro?
faqPage.a1: Ai Brok Trade Pro is a gamified mining simulation platform that allows you to earn NTX tokens by purchasing and managing virtual tools.
faqPage.q2: How can I increase my earnings?
faqPage.a2: You can increase your mining rate by purchasing more powerful tools in the 'Upgrade' section. You can also earn bonuses by inviting friends to join your team.
faqPage.a3: NTX is the native token of the Ai Brok Trade Pro platform. You accumulate it through mining and can use it within the app's ecosystem.
faqPage.q4: How does the referral system work?
faqPage.a4: When someone signs up using your invitation code, they join your team. You earn a percentage of your team members' mining activity, spread across several levels.

aboutPage.title: About Us
aboutPage.p1: We are a passionate team dedicated to blockchain technology and decentralized finance. Our mission with Ai Brok Trade Pro is to create an accessible and fun gateway to the world of cryptocurrencies.
aboutPage.p2: We believe that learning should be an engaging experience, and we have designed this platform to simulate the concepts of mining and rewards in a simple and visual way.

aboutDetailed.heroTitle: AI-powered automated trading for real results
aboutDetailed.heroP1: AIBrokTrade is an AI-based automated trading system designed to generate profitable trades in financial markets fully automatically. It uses advanced predictive analytics to identify opportunities and execute trades with high precision.
aboutDetailed.heroP2: Its technology combines artificial intelligence with strategies developed by experienced professional traders, achieving a balance between safety, efficiency, and profitability.
aboutDetailed.alt1: People collaborating on finance and technology

1.title: Intelligent Analysis
1.body: The bot constantly analyzes markets, studying technical indicators, trends, and historical patterns to detect opportunities.

2.title: Automatic Execution
2.body: When the system detects a high-probability trade, it executes the order automatically with no human intervention.

3.title: Risk Management
3.body: It adjusts position sizes and applies control strategies to protect capital and optimize risk/reward.

4.title: Real Earnings
4.body: Earnings are reflected directly in your account. You can withdraw capital or profits at any time.

why.title: Why invest with AIBrokTradePro?
items: Full automation: no trading experience needed; the system works for you.
High accuracy: estimated effectiveness between 85% and 95% thanks to AI.
Free withdrawal: funds arenâ€™t locked; withdraw anytime.
Full transparency: see results and activity in real time.
Continuous learning: the AI improves with every trade.

earnings.title: How are earnings generated?
earnings.p: When you deposit funds, the system uses them to perform automated trades in crypto, forex, and commodities. Daily gains depend on the invested amount and market conditions, always within sustainable ranges.

mission.title: AIBrokTradePro Mission
mission.body: Our mission is to enable anyone, regardless of experience, to generate passive income through automated trading. We combine AI, human strategy, and advanced technology to deliver a reliable, profitable, and accessible platform for everyone.
